articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission Clarifies Its Stand to Not Miss Opportunity for Reunification
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission Clarifies Its Stand to Not Miss Opportunity for Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army issued the following statement Tuesday:
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers finally kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression, defying strong public protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					
					 They do not hide that the exercises are pursuant to "an actual war scenario" targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 Huge troops of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet army have already set up positions in and around south Korea.
					
					 Even military personnel of those countries which took part in the last Korean war under the UN helmet are involved in the drills.
					
					 The war drills in the wake of the disclosure of the hideous state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK prove that the U.S. is the harasser of peace and provoker of a war in the new century that upsets the stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime and other allies that are taking part in the U.S.-led saber-rattling are just poor stooges little different from sacrifice to their master.
					
					 The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army clarifies as follows with a touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula:
					
					 1. The joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime are the most undisguised and serious final-phase violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA).
					
					 Paragraphs of the AA specify an unconditional halt to all arms buildup, large-scale military exercises and military provocations against the other side.
					
					 The armistice state that had been barely maintained in the unstable form of neither war nor peace by the peace-loving efforts of the DPRK has now turned into a catastrophic phase beyond control.
					
					 Now that the armistice state has been wantonly violated, the army and people of the DPRK state to the world that they have the right to do whatever they should do any time, not bound to the AA any longer.
					
					 All the actions of the army and people of the DPRK, not bound to the AA, will become merciless exercises of unpredictable and unimaginable physical strength.
					
					 2. The on-going joint military drills are a vicious challenge and violation of the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We love and value peace.
					
					 But now that the enemies are set to harass peace on the Korean Peninsula and encroach upon the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK by force of arms, the option to be taken by its army and people can not but be an indiscriminate counteraction.
					
					 As it has become clearer that the nation's sovereignty and peace which are more valuable than one's own life can be guaranteed only by arms, the army and people of the DPRK will take physical counteraction any moment, unhindered, to safeguard its sovereignty and peace.
					
					 3. The joint military drills are intolerable actions going against the Koreans' desire and wish for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all the Koreans to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country through the national reconciliation and cooperation and by their concerted efforts under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Now that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime counter the nation's cherished historic desire with military provocation, the DPRK can not but take the resolve to use force to defend the nation's reconciliation and unity and head for reunification.
					
					 The army of the DPRK has already finished the preparations to remove the root cause of all evils that stand in the way of the nation's reconciliation and unity by use of force for self-defence .
					
					 The situation shows that nothing has changed in the U.S. war policy of antagonizing the DPRK and only the great war of reunification remains to be done to settle accounts with them by the use of merciless arms.
					
					 The war for reunification to be waged by the DPRK will not end in armistice.
					
					 What remains to be done now is to wage a merciless sacred war for wiping out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to the last man and reunifying the country to win a great, admirable victory.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never miss the golden opportunity for waging a great war for reunification but achieve the cause of national reunification without fail, in hearty response to the militant order given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un during his inspection of the biggest hotspot area in the southernmost part of the southwestern front for defending the country on August 17.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Egyptian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Fijian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Fijian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Esalla Teleni, Fijian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Italian Businessman Arrives in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Italian Businessman Arrives in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, arrived here by air on Tuesday.

articles.title: King of Lesotho Wishes DPRK Success in Its Building of Thriving Nation
articles.content:
King of Lesotho Wishes DPRK Success in Its Building of Thriving Nation
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Letsie III, king of Lesotho, received credentials from Jo Yong Man, DPRK ambassador to his country on Aug. 15.
					 The ambassador conveyed to the king the greetings sent by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The king said he deemed it great honor to receive a warm fraternal salute from Kim Jong Un, extending best wishes to him for his good health and the Korean people's peace and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed the hope that the good friendly ties between the two countries and peoples and cooperative relations in all fields would grow stronger.
					
					 He extended wholehearted greetings to Kim Jong Un, the creditable successor to the cause of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also sincerely wished the great DPRK signal success in its efforts to build a rich and powerful country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Int'l Academic Symposium Opened
articles.content:
Int'l Academic Symposium Opened
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The international academic symposium of Kim Il Sung University was opened with due ceremony at the university Tuesday.
					 The symposium on the theme of "For social progress and prosperity" will hear more than a hundred valuable academic papers.
					
					 Present there were Vice Premier Kim Yong Jin, Chairman of the Education Commission Kim Sung Du and officials, teachers and researchers of the university.
					
					 Also present were Prof. and Dr. Elmar Kulke, dean of a faculty who is a delegate of Humboldt University of Germany, a delegation of Muenster College of Applied Sciences of Germany led by Head of a department Martin Weischer, a delegation of Chinese Ministry of Education led by Director Liu Baoli, a delegation of Liaoning University of China led by Prof. and Dr. Huang Taiyan, president of the university, a delegation of Yanbian University of China led by Rector Pak Yong Ho, a delegation of Jilin University of China led by Prof. Han Xiping, director of Marxist School, a delegation of the People's University of China led by Prof. Niu Weilin, permanent deputy secretary of the university party committee, Associate Prof. Chen Weipeng, delegate of Qinghua University of China, Prof. Pak Kon Il, delegate of the Academy of Social Sciences of China, Marceli Burdelski, delegate of Gdansk University and vice-president of the International Science Association of Poland, and Kim Jong, dele
					
					 gate of Joson University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan..
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 There was an opening address and congratulatory speech at the opening ceremony. 
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, said that the academic symposium will offer an opportunity to have a brisk exchange of successes and experience gained by teachers and scientists of Kim Il Sung University and foreign universities and scientific research institutions and widely exchange their views.
					
					 He expressed belief that the symposium will be an occasion to strengthen friendship bonds between themselves and boost exchange and cooperation. 
					
					 Vice Premier of the Cabinet Kim Yong Jin noted that it is natural for educators and scientists to take the lead of social progress and promote prosperity. 
					
					 He said the DPRK government has paid great attention to rapidly developing education and science and technology as required by the world trend.
					
					 The floor was taken by the heads of the delegations of the Chinese Ministry of Education and Yanbian University of China and the delegate of University of Gdansk of Poland. They congratulated the opening of the symposium saying that they were honored to take part in the symposium. 
					
					 They expressed the conviction that the participants would make positive contribution to the work for social progress and prosperity through the symposium. 
					
					 The participants looked round the photos showing the history of Kim Il Sung University which developed into the supreme temple of Juche-oriented education and science.

articles.title: Reception Given for Participants in Int'l Academic Symposium
articles.content:
Reception Given for Participants in Int'l Academic Symposium
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung University hosted a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Tuesday for the participants in the international academic symposium of the university.
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of different countries and a delegate of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan to the symposium.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Chairman of the Education Commission Kim Sung Du, President of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently Minister of Higher Education Song Ja Rip and officials, teachers and researchers of the university.

articles.title: Section Discussions Held at Int'l Academic Symposium of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Section Discussions Held at Int'l Academic Symposium of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Section discussions took place at the International Academic Symposium of Kim Il Sung University on Tuesday.
					 Present there were teachers and researchers of the university, foreign delegations and delegates and a delegate of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					
					 The symposium has been divided into sections of International Politics, Economics, Global Environmental Sciences, Multilingual Information Processing and Medical Science.
					
					 Made public at the sections were papers by prominent educators and scientists of famous universities and research institutes of different countries including the DPRK and a scholar of Chongryon.
					
					 Among them are "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il, a great defender of the stability on the Korean Peninsula and peace in Northeast Asia" (Ju Il Ung, teacher at Kim Il Sung University), "Peace and security issues on the Korean Peninsula" (Marceli Burdelski, vice-president of the International Science Association of Gdansk University, Poland), "Possibility for the building of knowledge-based economic power in the DPRK" (Pak Jong Chol, teacher at Kim Il Sung University), "Local capacity and global connections" (Prof. and Dr. Elmar Kulke, dean of Humboldt University of Germany), "Joint use of chaos theory and fuzzy-deduced neural network for monthly inflow forecasting in reservoir" (Jo Myong Bong, head of a department of Global Environmental Science faculty of Kim Il Sung University), "Study on database cross migration by modeling the database object hierarchically" (Ri Chung Hyok, researcher of Computer Science College of Kim Il Sung University), "Angiogenesis, researching 
					
					 model and its application" (Prof. and Dr. Ryu Myong Su of Yanbian University of China) and "Clinical study of limb replantation" (Pak Chol Ryong, researcher of Microsurgery Laboratory of Clinical Research Institute of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University). 
					
					 The speakers expounded academic issues. 
					
					 The symposium goes on.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates and Chongryon's Delegate Here for Academic Symposium
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates and Chongryon's Delegate Here for Academic Symposium
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of different countries arrived here on Monday to take part in the international academic symposium of Kim Il Sung University.
					 Among them were Prof. and Dr. Elmar Kulke, dean of a faculty who is a delegate of Hummboldt University of Germany, a delegation of Munster University of Application Science of Germany led by Head of a department Martin Weischer, a delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Education led by department director Liu Baoli, a delegation of Liaoning University of China led by Prof. and Dr. Huang Taiyan, president of the university, a delegation of Jilin University of China led by Prof. Han Xiping, director of the Marxist School, a delegation of the People's University of China led by Prof. Niu Weilin, permanent deputy secretary of the university party committee, and Associate Prof. Chen Weipeng, delegate of Qinghua University of China. 
					
					 Arriving here earlier were a delegation of Yanbian University of China led by President Piao Yonghao, Prof. Piao Jianyi, delegate of the Academy of Social Sciences of China, Marceli Burdelski, delegate of the University of Gdansk and vice-president of the International Science Association of Poland, and Kim Jong, delegate of Joson University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.

articles.title: Participants of Int'l Academic Symposium Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants of Int'l Academic Symposium Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The participants of the international academic symposium of Kim Il Sung University laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday before paying tribute to them.
					 On the same day the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group placed a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Torchlight Relay Racers Pass through South Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Torchlight Relay Racers Pass through South Hamgyong Province 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard participating in the torchlight relay race from the east coastal area passed through Hamhung City Tuesday after their start on Mt. Paektu.
					 Members of the young vanguard of South Hamgyong Province took over the torchlight at the top of Machon Pass, Tanchon City, from those of North Hamgyong Province on August 18. 
					
					 They passed through Tanchon City and Pukchong County amid welcome of people from all walks of life and youth and students. 
					
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the mosaic depicting peerlessly great persons at the Tanchon Smeltery and the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Pukchong County before paying tribute to them.
					
					  They took part in a congratulatory meeting of officials of the General Bureau of Mining in Tanchon Area and hero miners and those who had the honor of being received by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and young innovators of the affiliated enterprises and mines. 
					
					 At the campfire meeting of youth and students of Pukchong County they expressed their will to spruce up their residential quarters as a place good to live and work. 
					
					 They visited the Ryongjon Fruit Farm and Sojung Secondary School in Rakwon County where they looked back with deep emotion on the patriotic devotion made by the peerlessly great men to fruit farming and the education of youngsters.
					
					 Upon their arrival at Hamhung, they laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of the President in Hungnam District and on Tonghung Hill before paying tribute to him.
					
					 Going round the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, Ryongsong Machine Complex, February 8 Vinalon Complex and other industrial establishments and farms, they recollected the undying leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in South Hamgyong Province till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 At an oath-taking meeting of youth and students in South Hamgyong Province, speakers renewed their firm will to remain true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and work miracles and innovations in every difficult and labor-consuming site for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The torchlight relay racers passed through Kumya and Kowon counties.

articles.title: 2nd Rason International Trade Fair Draws Many Businesses
articles.content:
2nd Rason International Trade Fair Draws Many Businesses
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The 2nd International Trade Fair opened on Monday in Rason City, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					Taking part in the fair are more than 110 entities from various countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, the Czech Republic, Sweden, China and Chinese Taipei.
					
					 408 000 items in 36 000 varieties were on display at the fair, covering electric, electronic, light industry and foodstuff products and vehicles.
					
					The number of participants and varieties of exhibits is higher than the previous fair.
					
					Ho Myong Ho, director of the Rason Exhibition Corporation, told KCNA: 
					
					 "The fair, sponsored by the Rason Exhibition Corporation, is to be held for four days.
					
					 It has come under spotlight of many businessmen at home and abroad. It will help invigorate trade and business activities among countries and regions.
					
					 Rason is a special economic and trade zone of the DPRK, where special favors are granted in economic field.
					
					 The zone is turning into an international center for transit transport, trade, investment and financial and tourism services."

articles.title: Chinese Businessmen Interested in Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Businessmen Interested in Cooperation with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Many Chinese businessmen participating in the 2nd Rason International Trade Fair showed their interest in deepening cooperation with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Ren Yi, general manager of the Yanbian Renyi Automotive Co. Ltd., told KCNA:
					
					 "We have come here with various types of vehicles. We are willing to further exchange and cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 My company intends to take part in the exhibition held in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone in the future, too."
					
					 Cui Yanzhi, president of the Shandong Province Luqing Trade Company, said:
					
					 "My pavilion, exhibiting garments and computers, draws interests of visitors. I am satisfied with it.
					
					 I hope we will make trade deals on this occasion."
					
					 Chinese businesses take a lion's share in the exhibits presented by foreign businesses.
					
					 Highly appreciated at the exhibition are vehicles, garments and household electric appliances exhibited by businesses from Jilin Province bordering the DPRK, which are greatly interested in the development of the zone.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Help Koreans
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Help Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and staff members of the Cuban embassy here did friendship labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Factory on Tuesday on the occasion of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 They looked round the room devoted to the history of the factory, after being briefed on it in front of the boards bearing on-site teachings given by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They helped the employees in maize harvesting and talked to officials of the factory during break.
					
					 The ambassador said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by Kim Il Sung and Fidel Castro Ruz are now favorably developing.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials and employees of the factory would achieve great successes in the production.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Ready to Cope with Military Drill in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Ready to Cope with Military Drill in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un inspected island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwest front. 
					 There, he ordered the servicepersons of the detachments to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the area of the DPRK.
					
					 Upon hearing the news, the KPA servicepersons are in high spirit to lead the possible battle to a sacred war for national reunification.  
					
					Ho Kwang Bok, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 "Instead of drawing a bitter lesson from the Korean War (1950-1953), the U.S. imperialist kicked off the large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK, going against the tendency of times.
					
					 Physical counter measure can only deter a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is a steadfast will of the KPA not to tolerate the provokers and it is its traditional method to return fire for fire. 
					
					 Provokers should be mindful of a solemn warning of the KPA not to make an empty talk. 
					
					 There will be an annihilating counter attack in response to any possible aggression.
					
					 We will wipe out the aggression forces and achieve national reunification, as ordered by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un."
					
					Kim Un Gyong, a KPA solider, said:
					
					 "As the supreme commander solemnly declared, I and other soldiers of our unit will wipe out the enemy without mercy if even a single shell is dropped on this land and clearly show what his order to lead any battle to national reunification means."

articles.title: DPRK Agricultural Workers Vow to Fight alongside Soldiers in Same Trench
articles.content:
DPRK Agricultural Workers Vow to Fight alongside Soldiers in Same Trench 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers of the DPRK are expressing towering resentment at the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean warmongers busy with the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Ri Hui Song, chairperson of the Management Board of the Sosin Vegetable Farm in Ryokpho District, said:
					
					 All the agricultural workers are firmly determined to turn out in actions to wipe out the enemy shoulder to shoulder with service personnel of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un ordered the servicepersons to deal fatal blows at the enemy if even a single shell drops on the territory of the DPRK and to achieve the country's reunification.
					
					 His order is making the hearts of the agricultural workers burn with the will to annihilate the enemy.
					
					 We will wage a dynamic drive to increase grain production just as we did in the days of the hard-fought war when we ensured food supply in the wartime and fight alongside the soldiers in the same trench in case of emergency.
					
					 Kim Yong Ran, head of a sub-work team of the Majon Co-op Farm in Sinuiju City, said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime know nothing about the army and people of the DPRK. We should clearly demonstrate before them the might of single-minded unity more powerful than nukes.
					
					 Kim Kuk, head of Workteam No. 3 of the Yonphung Co-op Farm in Anju City, said:
					
					  The U.S. imperialists and their followers are oblivious of the bitter defeat they suffered in the 1950s.  
					
					  The moves of the U.S. imperialists are arousing hatred among the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					  All the service personnel and people will wipe out the enemies to the last man.
					
					 The generation which won victory on July 27 will be followed by the generation of Songun which will win a final victory.
					
					  Kang Chang Sik, head of Workteam No. 3 of the Taephung Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County, noted that no force on earth can match the army and the people who formed a harmonious whole with the leader and are all out in the actions to implement his order in a do-or-die spirit, adding that a final victory is in store for them.

articles.title: Young Koreans Make Good Job in Production and Construction
articles.content:
Young Koreans Make Good Job in Production and Construction 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The young people of the DPRK launched the vigorous shock brigade movement, making a great contribution to the country's prosperity and improvement of the people's standard of living.
					 The builders of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station completed the basic dam of Power Station No. 2 while speeding up the concrete tamping of the dam of Power Station No.1.
					
					 Young builders for the reconstruction and repair of northern railways broke down the wall of a tunnel extending thousands of meters 45 days earlier than schedule and procured at least 10 000 timbers for the construction in 20 days.
					
					 Youth performed feats in tunneling and mining and took charge of mucking and laying of roadbed at coalfields across the country. 
					
					 Activities of youth have been remarked in the metal industrial field.
					
					 Members of the Kim Hyok youth shock brigade of the Chollima Steel Complex made innovations in the settling reservoir project as part of raw materials-related system for anthracite gasification and youth of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex formed a shock brigade to increase the production of heavy rails and helped the gas generator project.
					
					 Young people in the field of railway transport including the Pyongyang, Kaechon and Hamhung railway bureaus repaired lots of locomotives and passenger and freight cars, upgrading transport capacity.
					
					 Young people stepped up the shock brigade movement at deep underground cutting faces in Kumgol and in major units of Komdok as well as at the construction site of zinc oxide production base in Tanchon, registering successes.
					
					 Many young people living in Pyongyang dedicated their efforts to the building of Changjon Street as nighttime youth shock brigaders.
					
					 A great number of young people have performed feats at the construction sites including those of the Orangchon Power Station, Hamhung Youth Power Station No.1 and Ryongmae Island Tideland Reclamation.
					
					 Young people have also been active in the April 15 Technical Innovation Shock Brigade Movement and in the cooperative farms.

articles.title: "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", Faked Document
articles.content:
"Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", Faked Document
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- 102 years has passed since the Japanese imperialists faked up the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					 On Aug. 22, 1910, Japan surrounded the Korean royal place with its forces and pressurized King Sunjong to sign a "commission of full power" in conspiracy with pro-Japanese traitors.
					
					 For fear of the Korean people's resistance towards the enforcement, Japan made public the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" a week later, on Aug. 29.
					
					 The fabrication was disclosed by Sunjong's will saying, "The ratification of the 'Korea-Japan Annexation' was not my doing. It was cooked up by Japan in league with a group of traitors, including Ri Wan Yong. 
					
					 Japan put me in confinement and intimidated me in the time of 'treaty signing'"
					
					 The treaty was not signed by the King.
					
					 International law, applicable to countries the world over in those days, stipulated that a state treaty can come into effect only when it carries a king's signature and it remains a dead document when it is not signed by a king.
					
					 There was neither a royal signature nor a seal in the "royal edict" allegedly issued by Sunjong to announce the "annexation" on Aug. 29, 1910.
					
					 But, there was a royal seal and signature in the "royal edict" issued by the Japanese king on the same day.
					
					 This indicates Japan's allegation that the "treaty" was legally concluded with approval of King Sunjong is a sheer lie and it was an invalid one in view of international law.
					
					 The "treaty" deprived the Korean people of their sovereignty and put Korea under Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are not admitting their past crimes against the Korean people still now, while running amuck for staging a comeback to the whole of Korea.
					
					 Their misconduct touches off stronger anti-Japanese sentiments among the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Inspired by Supreme Commander's Order
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Inspired by Supreme Commander's Order
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, during his recent inspection tour of island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwest front on Aug. 17, ordered the servicepersons to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the area of the DPRK and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification.  
					 The order inspired DPRK servicepersons with confidence of victory in possible battles against provokers.
					
					 Kang Ryong Se, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), told KCNA:
					
					 "In his lifetime, leader Kim Jong Il often spoke highly of the remarkable courage and grit possessed by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The order, which struck terror into the enemies' hearts, can be issued only by Kim Jong Un with matchless grit and far-sighted sagacity.
					
					 The world will witness how the DPRK will smash the warmongers, the U.S. forces and the group of traitor Lee Myung Bak."
					
					 Pyon Yong Ho, a KPISF officer, said:
					
					 "There is a saying that victory in war depends on courage and resourcefulness.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un took a wooden boat to visit the island defence detachments in the frontline area to indicate ways for winning victory in battles.
					
					 The war exercises kicked off by the United States and south Korea have been overpowered by his merciless offensive spirit from the outset.
					
					 We will deal an annihilating blow to them if they drop even a single shell on our waters, and achieve national reunification, a cherished desire of the Korean nation."
					
					 Ri Jin Gu, a KPISF soldier, said:
					
					 "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's inspection tour of the frontline units was prompted by his ardent love for the country and the people. It is evident that we have already won in battles.
					
					 I will devote myself to achieving the national reunification, in hearty response to the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: DPRK Affected by Flood
articles.content:
DPRK Affected by Flood 
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Flood, triggered by heavy rain on Aug. 18-19, hit some areas in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to an initial survey, the flood left more than 90 dwelling houses and public buildings destroyed or submerged in Pyongyang and Nampho cities and South Phyongan Province and nearly 440 people homeless.
					
					 Meanwhile, over 560 hectares of farmland were inundated and nearly 100 hectares were washed away or buried in west coastal areas and South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Peace through Nationwide Drive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Peace through Nationwide Drive
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises make all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad renew their pledge to turn out in the nationwide sacred war to resolutely meet the reckless challenges of the aggressors and achieve the cherished historic desire for national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 The Korean nation has suffered from the country's division for nearly 70 years by foreign forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Koreans have persistently struggled to reunify the country by devoting their blood and sweats. But the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors have committed ceaseless moves for confrontation with the DPRK and a war of aggression against it, going against the strong aspiration of all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad for national unity and reunification. So, the Koreans in the north and the south have lived, being exposed to the constant danger of a war.
					
					 They can no longer tolerate the tragedy and sufferings of division and live in the danger of war. To mercilessly wipe out wicked confrontation maniacs and warmongers through the nationwide sacred war is the only way of achieving the national reunification, the cherished desire of the fellow countrymen, and guaranteeing the durable peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Koreans will become victors in the just sacred war as they will turn out as one with surging hatred against the aggressors and quislings and with the patriotic will for reunification.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dare mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, this will not be confined to a local war. The DPRK will not miss the golden opportunity and lead it to a great war for national renunciation.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Lambasted by DPRK Papers
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Lambasted by DPRK Papers
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are saber-rattling to invade the DPRK in view of its scale, character and aim, from A to Z, say papers Tuesday in bylined commentaries.
					 UFG is an unpardonable criminal act of wrecking peace on the Korean Peninsula and plunging the Korean nation in the crucible of a nuclear war, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Preemptive attack is by no means a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will show clearly the warmongers what a real war is like. If the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea foolishly mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, it will not miss the golden opportunity. The U.S. and the Lee group should not act rashly.
					
					 Minju Joson says if the warmongers drop even a bullet on the territory of the DPRK, its army and people will not miss the golden opportunity to wage a great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Switchover in Its Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Switchover in Its Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should immediately roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, stop foolish state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism and war racket against the DPRK and make a bold decision to make a policy switchover, urges Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a byline article titled "The U.S. will have to pay a dear price for its hostile moves against the DPRK".
					 In the October 12, 2000, DPRK-U.S. joint communique and the September 19, 2005 joint statement the U.S. said it has no intent to attack or invade the DPRK and confirmed its will to respect sovereignty of the DPRK and co-exist with it peacefully. But the U.S. has never abandoned its intention to antagonize the ideology and social system of the DPRK and stifle them, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The vicious cycle of confrontation and escalated tension is repeating itself on the Korean Peninsula and the prospect of its denuclearization is becoming gloomier due to the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. will never be able to evade the blame for having laid a stumbling block in the way of settling the nuclear issue on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is going reckless, utterly ignorant of the disposition of the army and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the building of a thriving nation by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The Korean people are convinced that it was a just choice that they have bolstered up the war deterrent to protect the sovereignty of the country and the security of the nation from the U.S. evermore undisguised nuclear threat.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are fully ready to go into action. Sky-high is their determination to mercilessly meet any military challenge of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak and Prosecution Authorities Accused of Their Base Conspiracy
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak and Prosecution Authorities Accused of Their Base Conspiracy
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean prosecution authorities recently covered up all gruesome scandals of traitor Lee Myung Bak and his confidants and relatives and the clan of the "Saenuri Party" under the pretext of "baseless suspicion" and "lack of evidence".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The prosecution's "biased investigation" and "targeted investigation" are a product of the base conspiracy and tie-up among traitor Lee, the "Saenuri Party" and the prosecution to seek the stay of the conservative regime in power.
					
					 It is quite illogical to expect a fair investigation into the scandals of the ruling forces from the prosecution hand in glove with the Lee group.
					
					 Running high is the aspiration of people from all walks of life in south Korea to bring about new politics, a new life by ousting from power the conservative ruling forces hell-bent on the traitorous rule and scandals with the approach of the "presidential election".  
					
					 Opposition parties and progressive pro-reform forces are determined to resolutely judge the corrupt and incompetent conservative forces as required by the public.
					
					 Upset by this, prosecutors are becoming undisguised in their actions to side with the Lee group in a bid to enable the conservative regime to stay in power. The developments clearly prove if such reckless acts of the puppet prosecution are allowed, it is impossible to realize the desire of the south Korean people for progress and reforms and the fall of the conservative regime.

articles.title: Reappointment of Chairman of S. Korean "Human Rights Committee" under Fire
articles.content:
Reappointment of Chairman of S. Korean "Human Rights Committee" under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary accused traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea of reappointing the chairman of the "Human Rights Committee."
					 Hyon Pyong Chol who was reappointed as the chairman is a servant loyal to traitor Lee Myung Bak as he has been busy covering up the traitor's human rights abuses, instead of working hard for ensuring the rights of south Koreans, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Not only people but opposition parties of south Korea and even politicians of the "Saenuri Party" are strongly protest against this reappointment.
					
					 Clear is the real aim sought by Lee in reappointing Hyon despite strong public rebuff. It is nobody's secret that the traitor has perpetrated all sorts of human rights abuses. It is as clear as noonday that actions would be intensified to bring those human rights abuses to light after Lee steps down. For this reason, he let his servant hold the post of the three year-term chairman of the Human Rights Committee in advance in a bid to bar his crimes from being probed.
					
					 Hyon's reappointment would help intensify the infringement upon the rights of south Koreans and step up the group of traitors' unpopular rule.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that it is quite natural for the south Korean people to turn out in anti-Lee Myung Bak actions.

articles.title: Provocative War Exercises Slammed
articles.content:
Provocative War Exercises Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U. S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers finally kicked off madcap Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises on Monday, defying the unanimous demand of the Korean people and other peace-loving people of the world for their cancellation.
					 Ulji Focus Lens was replaced by Ulji Freedom Guardian in 2008. Since then, the aggressive nature of the joint military exercises has become evermore pronounced.
					
					 When the military maneuvers were staged under the changed codename the U.S. asserted that they were combined drills of new form as "the operations were spearheaded by the south Korean army and they were supported by the U.S. forces."
					
					 This bears a close resemblance to the situation on the eve of the June 25 war.
					
					 Just as what the U.S. imperialists did in those days their scenario is to stage a farce of transferring the right to command wartime operations to the puppet army and kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian to cope with it.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. hurled in the saber-rattling even military troops of different countries which had dispatched their troops to the Korean War, pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					
					 Through this the warmongers seek to revive the "UN forces" which exist only in name and get them ready to fight any war any time and thus ignite a war for aggression at any moment. 
					
					 The aggressive nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian was clearly revealed in the whole course of the saber-rattling staged by the U.S. so far.
					
					 When they staged UFG in 2010, the warmongers conducted for the first time in history the operation for stabilization in top secrecy on the premise that the region of the DPRK came under their occupation. And they openly staged these drills last year.
					
					 The offensive drills against the DPRK including landing exercise, mobile exercise and shelling drill staged in spots simulating its coastal areas were conducted in different areas including five islands in the West Sea of Korea whenever joint war drills were staged.
					
					 This saber-rattling repeated itself across south Korea this year, too, creating a touch-and-go situation.
					
					 Newly deployed special vehicles MRAPs are involved in these exercises to pave the way for invasion of the DPRK. This clearly indicates what is the objective of the on-going saber-rattling.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Ulji Freedom Guardian
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military drills kicked off by the south Korean warmongers across south Korea together with the U.S. are a very dangerous military provocation threatening the DPRK and driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary titled "DPRK will deal prompt merciless counter-blows."
					 Noting that the joint military drills are exercises for a war against the DPRK to all intents and purposes, the commentary goes on:
					
					 It is not secret that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers have rounded off the preparations and procedures for the war against the DPRK through UFG. 
					
					 They may ignite a war any time while staging UFG. 
					
					 In case the war drills lead to an actual war, all Koreans in the north and the south will suffer from it and it will spill over to neighboring countries to disturb peace and stability in Northeast Asia. It is as clear as noonday. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are, indeed, disturbers of peace and war provokers threatening the peace and increasing the danger of war not only on the Korean Peninsula but also in the region. 
					
					 All the service personnel of the DPRK are now keeping themselves fully ready to deal deadly counter-blows at the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers if they dare ignite a war. 
					
					 If they fire even a single shell at the territory of the DPRK, its army and people will never miss the golden opportunity to wage a war for national reunification. 
					
					 There will be only a disgraceful defeat for the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges Japan to Admit Past Crimes
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges Japan to Admit Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Japan's brazen-faced denial of past history is only adding to its crimes.
					 As known, the Japanese reactionaries including ministers flocked to Yasukuni Shrine, symbol of militarism, on August 15.
					
					 They eulogized the Japanese imperialists, who imposed untold misfortune and sufferings on the Korean nation, as "forerunners who laid groundwork for the prosperity of Japan at their priceless sacrifices".
					
					 This touched off the anger of Koreans. August 15 this year marks the 67th anniversary of Japan's defeat and August 22, the 102nd anniversary of fabrication of the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					
					 Koreans can never forget the disgrace they suffered at the hands of the Japanese imperialists even though old century and generations are replaced by new ones.
					
					 In the past the Japanese imperialists forcibly took away to Japan more than 8.4 million innocent young and middle-aged Koreans and massacred at least one million Koreans.
					
					 They forced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery, a hideous crime against humanity.
					
					 But Japan's attitude now reveals its impudence and brutal nature.
					
					 It called the unprecedented sexual slavery a "misconduct of individuals" and even said that "women volunteered to earn money", describing it as "history of toilet room". This was little short of rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims.
					
					 In addition to its denial of the crime-woven history, Japan is trying to revive militarism to make the said history repeat itself on this land.
					
					 It published for several years defense white papers claiming Tok Islets and revised "three principles of arms export", openly calling for going nuclear, emerging a military giant and exercising the right of collective self-defence.
					
					 Vicious politically-motivated persecution and crackdown on Koreans in Japan, victims of the Japanese imperialists' rule over Korea, and their descendents, are violating their right to existence and national rights.
					
					 This clearly shows again to what extent the Japanese reactionaries have gone in their ambition for aggression and bitterness toward the Korean nation.
					
					 An apology and reparation for the past crimes serve as a touchstone judging Japan's total ruin and rebirth.
					
					 Japan should know that many countries and regions around the world and even its allies are urging it to make apology and reparation for the sexual slavery this month marking the anniversary of its surrender in World War II.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers, oblivious of the historical lesson, have gone reckless in their moves to ignite a new war. This has created once again a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot.
					 They kicked off extremely provocative big joint military drills for aggression, defying the unanimous desire and wish of the people at home and abroad for peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian military drills now under way with the involvement of 30 000 U.S. troops including those based abroad and huge south Korean forces and even U.S. allies are apparently a dangerous saber-rattling targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The enemies are making lame excuses, calling the drills "annual defense exercises" but the maneuver is the most dangerous and vicious act aimed at aggression of the DPRK in the light of its scale, nature, codename and program.
					
					 "Special warfare drill" targeting the headquarters of the revolution of the DPRK and "drill for preemptive attack" on strategic strongholds including nuclear and missile bases in it and other programs of UFG can not be viewed otherwise than a declaration of an all-out war against it.
					
					 The application of the field operational control system of the south Korean puppet army that took effect from last year and the right to the operational control which south Korea was granted for the first time in the history of joint military drills highlight the danger and belligerency of UFG.
					
					 The enemies' extremely provocative moves have rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that it reminds one of the eve of the Korean War in the 1950s.
					
					 After World War II the U.S. defined the peninsula as "a ground for testing stand-off between American-style democracy and communism" and an outpost for realizing its strategy for world domination. So, it put the south Korean puppet forces under arms and prodded them to ignite the Korean war. Now it is moving to follow in the footsteps of those adventurers, obsessed by wild ambition.
					
					 The U.S. aims to topple the DPRK by force during the office of pro-U.S. stooges like Lee Myung Bak, who put traitor Syngman Rhee into the shade, and turn the whole peninsula into a springboard for its strategy for domination of Asia. This is the essence of the new U.S. defense strategy and the ultimate goal of the on-going military drills.
					
					 The world's most powerful military means including nuclear weapons are amassed on the peninsula where there are neither durable mechanism nor guarantee for heading off a war. Any slightest provocation will not be just confined to a local war but lead to bilateral all-out nuclear war and a regional war and spill over into new world war in the end.
					
					 The military gambling of the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime deserves censure of the public at home and abroad as it jeopardizes the peace and stability of the world including Northeast Asia.
					
					 If the enemies dare preempt an attack on the DPRK, it will never miss the opportunity for the sake of the lasting peace and stability of the peninsula, the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK will mount deadly strikes at the bases of aggressors and provokers and remove the source of evil that troubles the world so as to greet national reunification, the cherished desire of the Koreans.
					
					 This is the fixed determination and will of the army and people of the DPRK in response to the order of the illustrious commander.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies will be made to meet a miserable end in the face of undaunted attack by the great country of Mt. Paektu led by the great commander.

articles.title: Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises against DPRK Urged
articles.content:
Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises against DPRK Urged
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and 46 other civic and public organizations and organizations of youth and students in south Korea held a press conference on Aug. 20 in denunciation of the warmongers' dangerous joint military exercises to invade the north.
					 The organizations said that the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces finally kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, adding that the largest-ever saber-rattling in which more than 30 000 U.S. troops and nearly 500 000 south Korean troops and civilians are involved is explicitly aimed at invading the north, to all contents and purposes.
					
					 Even military personnel of different countries including Australia, Britain, Canada, New Zealand, Denmark, Norway and France will take part in the joint military drills for deploying forces on the Korean Peninsula from Japanese military bases in "contingency", they disclosed.
					
					 They said the U.S. again revealed its attempt to boost the role of "UN Forces Command" and continue putting the south Korean army under its control even after the transfer of wartime operational control.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should immediately stop the illegal joint military exercises for aggression escalating the military tension and threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula, they concluded.

articles.title: Jobless Rate Rises in South Korea
articles.content:
Jobless Rate Rises in South Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Joblessness has reached a serious phase in Seoul, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 According to a survey made by an expert organization on Monday, the number of the unemployed reached 2.43 million in Seoul this year. 
					
					 This is an almost 20 percent increase over that in 2007.
					
					 Unemployed women accounted for 39 percent of the jobless people whose number sharply increased under the present regime.
					
					 In the recent five years, young people's unemployment rate in Seoul was comparatively higher than that in other areas.
					
					 Experts said that the number of the young unemployed is much greater than what was made public when those young people who gave up seeking jobs are included. They underscored the need to take urgent measures for providing jobs.

articles.title: Big S. Korean Businessmen's Murderous Crackdown upon Workers Slammed
articles.content:
Big S. Korean Businessmen's Murderous Crackdown upon Workers Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The national solidarity council of part-time workers unions of south Korea issued a statement on August 19 denouncing the Hyundai Motors for its murderous and illegal crackdown upon the unionists.
					 The statement said that core members of the part-time workers trade unions of the company were suppressed by gangsters hired by the business side on August 18.
					
					 Early in the morning, dozens of gangsters committed violence against the heads for organization and information of the union in the compound of the company and referred them to the police under the groundless pretext that "they illegally occupied it."
					
					 Not content with it, in the afternoon the gangsters abducted the secretary general and the head of general affairs of the trade union before committing violence against them and throwing them out in a place far from the company.
					
					 The statement condemned the company side for perpetrating such gangsterism, branding the workers' walking in the compound of the company as "illegal occupation." 
					
					 The company side committed such hideous terrorism for the mere reason that the trade union opposed the deceptive step taken for part-time workers, it noted.
					
					 It stressed it would turn out in actions for preventing the violence by big businessmen and abolishing the part-time jobs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) --The Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare carried in its 199th issue leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					 The work made public on January 3, 1992 said the cause of socialism was a just one for realizing the independence of the popular masses and humankind's advance toward socialism is the law governing the development of history.
					
					 The work clarified an idea that it is the general line for building socialism to strengthen the people's government and increase its function and role and thoroughly carry out the three revolutions --ideological, technical and cultural -- as well as its validity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Peruvian Political Party's Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Peruvian Political Party's Bulletin
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru carried on its bulletin on August 6 the main contents of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					 The work made public on July 26, 2012 clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by love for the country and its people.
					
					 The work also clarifies important issues in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Mexican Committee for Study of Kimilsungism Renamed
articles.content:
Mexican Committee for Study of Kimilsungism Renamed 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism was renamed the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 A renaming ceremony was held in Mexico City on August 13.
					
					 President of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism Ramon Jimenez Lopez, who is also president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said it was a great honor for them to rename the committee.
					
					 They referred to the exploits performed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who declared the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, adding it is the guiding idea for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of global independence.
					
					 They renewed their determination to study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as required by the actual conditions of Mexico and extend full support to the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Mexico and staff members of his embassy were present there on invitation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation Lauded by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation Lauded by Foreigners 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Events took place between August 9 and 13 to mark the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They were meetings, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and reading sessions held by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and at the hospital of the Ministry of Defense of Guinea.
					
					 Displayed in their venues were works of the peerlessly great men, books on their undying exploits and photos showing the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association said in his speech made at a meeting that the Korean people waged a protracted struggle under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, adding that as a result, the country was freed from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and its people emerged a dignified people.
					
					 The chairman expressed conviction that the tradition of friendship between the Russian and Korean peoples who fought against their common foes would steadily grow stronger.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said in a lecture that thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung the Korean people fought against Japanese imperialism, liberating the country on August 15, 1945 and could build a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense in the subsequent period.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India said the anti-Japanese armed struggle organized and led by Kim Il Sung was an unprecedented legendary guerrilla struggle, adding his great personality as the legendary commander of the guerrillas will remain long in history. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at a meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Liberator of Korea by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Liberator of Korea by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Media of India and Cambodia carried special write-ups and aired special programs on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Indian paper Indian and World Event on August 13 allotted a whole page to articles titled "Benefactor of Liberation" and "Legendary Guerrilla" with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The anti-Japanese armed struggle in Korea was a life-or-death fight against the formidable Japanese army that tried to dominate the world together with the then fascist Germany.
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 The Korean people bravely turned out in the anti-Japanese sacred war, looking up to him as the sun of the nation who will liberate Korea.
					
					 The Korean people's cause of national liberation was accomplished on August 15, 1945 at last.
					
					 The exploits he performed for liberating the country are always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives century after century.
					
					 Cambodia's AKP said on August 11:
					
					 Kim Il Sung organized an unprecedented legendary guerrilla struggle to liberate Korea.
					
					 He waged a guerrilla struggle for 15 years without any state assistance and aid from a regular army.
					
					 The 15-year-long struggle was unprecedented in the world history of the guerrilla movement.
					
					 The immortal, great personality of Kim Il Sung as a legendary guerrilla hero will always go down to history. 
					
					 The state radio of Cambodia on August 10 aired a program praising him for achieving the historic cause of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: China, U.S. at Odds over Africa
articles.content:
China, U.S. at Odds over Africa
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- China-U.S. conflict over Africa is surfacing.
					 For several years the U.S. has been the second largest trading partner with Africa after China.
					
					 The volume of annual trade between China and African countries surged to 166.3 billion U.S. dollars and exports to China from African countries reached 93 billion U.S. dollars.
					
					 African countries are voicing favor for the beneficial economic ties with China.
					
					 China-Africa relations have made big progress while the U.S. reeling from economic recession has been engrossed in "war on terrorism" in Afghanistan and a nuclear row against Iran.
					
					 Much upset, the U.S. has sent delegations of American businessmen to Mozambique, Tanzania, Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya and other African countries from early this year, committing sort of energy and other aid.
					
					 In June it convened a meeting for law on growth opportunity for Africa.
					
					 It made honeyed words of rendering aid for the socio-economic progress of Africa by the law and, on the other hand, published "a new Africa strategy" aimed at the establishment of political hegemony in the African continent.
					
					 U.S. State Secretary Hillary made an 11-day tour of Senegal, Uganda, South Sudan, Nigeria, Kenya, South Africa and other countries from July 31 to realize the strategy.
					
					 She started her tour with an address on "democracy" at a university in Senegal. Her tour was consistent with interference in the internal affairs of African countries under the signboards of "human rights and democracy".
					
					 She even made comments slandering China.
					
					 She said it would be better to cooperate with more "beneficial and responsible" country rather than a country "exploiting" the resources of Africa, indirectly referring to China.
					
					 This has promptly triggered off China's rebuff.
					
					 Xinhua said that it is none other than the U.S. and other Western countries that squeeze wealth out of Africa and leave nothing behind to meet their own interests.
					
					 A South African political and international affairs expert said that in fact, the U.S. tries to curb China's influence on Africa. Noting that Hillary warned African countries of Chinese "imperialism", the expert added that still she advocates U.S. imperialism in Africa.
					
					 Analysts see that conflict between China and the U.S. over Africa will become more serious.

articles.title: Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom publica declaracion
articles.content:
Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom publica declaracion
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- La representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 21 la siguiente declaracion:
					A pesar de las fuertes protestas y denuncias de los nacionales y extranjeros, el imperialismo estadounidense y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos iniciaron por fin los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					
					Los enemigos ni siquiera se molestan a ocultar que la presenta maniobra se desarrolla segun el "plan de guerra real" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Actualmente, esta emplazado en el Sur de Corea y la zona periferica un gran numero de tropas agresoras norteamericanas y uniformados del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Participan tambien hasta el personal militar de los paises que habian tomado parte en la pasada guerra de agresion a Corea abusando de la insignia de la ONU.
					
					La maniobra, precedida del tremendo atentado de terrorismo politico de Estado contra la RPDC, demuestra que EE.UU. es el perturbador de paz y provocador de guerra del nuevo siglo que destruye la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos y otras fuerzas seguidoras, que toman parte en los presentes ejercicios militares, muestran por si solos su estatus de lacayos miserables que serviran de chivos expiatorios para su amo.
					
					Puesto que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega a la fase extremada a punto de guerra, la representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom declara como sigue:
					
					1. Los presentes ejercicios militares conjuntos del imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos son un acto mas abierto y grave que rompe en la ultima etapa el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea.
					
					Los articulos de ese documento estipulan claramente el cese incondicional del aumento de fuerzas armadas de todo tipo, los ejercicios militares de gran envergadura y las provocaciones militares contra la contraparte.
					
					El estado de armisticio, que gracias a los esfuerzos pacifistas de la RPDC, se mantenia por un pelo sin fijarse en la guerra ni en la paz, llega a la fase insostenible por mas tiempo.
					
					Hoy dia, en que se ha roto indudablemente el estado de armisticio, nuestro ejercito y pueblo declaran a todo el mundo que tienen el derecho a hacer lo que le toca hacer en cualquier momento sin comprometerse mas al Acuerdo de Armisticio.
					
					Todas las acciones de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que no se comprometen al Acuerdo de Armisticio, pasaran al ejercicio de las fuerzas fisicas imprevisibles, inimaginables e implacables.
					
					2. La presente maniobra deviene un desafio brutal y violacion de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La RPDC ama la paz y la aprecia.
					
					A nuestro ejercito y pueblo no les quedan otra opcion que el indiscriminado contraataque bajo la situacion de hoy en que los enemigos perturban flagrantemente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana e intentan violar con fuerzas nuestra sagrada soberania. 
					
					Ya que se hizo evidente que es posible defender solo con los fusiles la soberania y la paz de la nacion, mas valiosas que la vida, la reaccion fisica de nuestro ejercito y pueblo para defenderlas tendra lugar sin limites a cualquier hora.
					
					3. La presente maniobra constituye un insoportable desafio a la aspiracion y demanda de todos los connacionales sobre la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Es unanime la aspiracion de todos los connacionales a lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria mediante la reconciliacion y cooperacion de la nacion y con las fuerzas unidas bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Frente al hecho de que el imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos desafian con la provocacion militar al anhelo historico de la nacion, nos vimos obligados a tomar la decision de defender la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y lograr la reunificacion con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Nuestro ejercito ya termino perfectamente los preparativos para eliminar mediante el uso de las fuerzas armadas de autodefensa la fuente de todos los males que impiden la reconciliacion y la unidad de nuestra nacion.
					
					La realidad demuestra que no hubo ningun cambio en la politica de guerra de EE.UU., que vino hostilizando a la RPDC, y lo unico que falta es la guerra de reunificacion para ajustar las cuentas con los implacables fusiles.
					
					No puede haber el armisticio en esa gran guerra para la reunificacion que vamos a hacer.
					
					Nos quedan solo la despiadada guerra sagrada por lograr la reunificacion exterminando al imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos y la historica tarea de terminarla con la gran victoria digna de admiracion de todo el mundo.
					
					Al acatar con el corazon la orden de combate dada por el Comandante Supremo inspeccionando el pasado dia 17 la zona mas candente del extremo sur del frente sudoeste en defensa de la patria, nuestro ejercito y pueblo cumpliran sin falta la causa de reunificacion de la patria sin perder la oportunidad de oro de la gran guerra de reunificacion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Fiji
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Fiji
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio este martes en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador de Fiji en Corea, Esalla Teleni.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el embajador.

articles.title: Acogeremos segundo dia 27 de julio: ACNC
articles.content:
Acogeremos segundo dia 27 de julio: ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- A pesar de la advertencia repetida de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los agresores yanquis y la banda traidora surcoreana libraron el entrenamiento militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					En este simulacro que se efectua del dia 20 al 31 de este mes participan mas de 30 mil efectivos de la tropa norteamericana, mas de 56 mil uniformados del ejercito titere, mas de 440 mil civiles del Sur de Corea y hasta los militares de los paises satelites.
					
					  El simulacro que asemeja a la pasada guerra coreana deviene el grave desafio a las opiniones interiores y exteriores que desean la paz y el alivio de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y una declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					  En estos dias, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana es muy aguda por el caso del atentado terrorista politico de Estado promovido por Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC.
					
					  El incidente eventual bajo la situacion peligrosa puede convertirse en la guerra total, lo que es la leccion que nos da la historia de la guerra de la humanidad.
					
					  La puesta en marcha de este entrenamiento en la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente en el mundo, demuestra que se impulsa planificadamente en la etapa practica el intento agresivo de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos de provocar sin falta la nueva guerra.
					
					  Los maniacos de guerra incitan la guerra anti-RPDC ubicando de manera concentrada todos los medios de guerra en la isla Yonphyong del Mar Oeste  donde es mas aguda la situacion de confrontacion militar y estan enmaranadas las relaciones de intereses de muchos paises.
					
					  Para colmo, los titeres surcoreanos movilizaron en este simulacro hasta los vehiculos especiales de proteccion de mina de marca norteamericana, revelando abiertamente su intento de invasion armada mediante la operacion de rompimiento de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					  El objetivo del simulacro en que se movilizaron la capitana Blue Ridge de la septima flota norteamericana y otro colectivo de buques de guerra, las fuerzas aereas  y  hasta los medios de ataque nuclear, es atacar primero la maxima Direccion de la Revolucion de la RPDC y las posiciones estrategicas incluyendo las bases de nucleo y misiles, dominar la tierra de la RPDC y desplegar la operacion civil para asentar la base politica, economica y militar que permiten preparar el trampolin de agresion a Asia.
					
					  Todos los hechos demuestran quien es el autor que destruye y viola la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y quien es el provocador de guerra.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan muy indignados sobre el imperialismo yanqui y la banda titere que recurren al atentado terrorista politico de Estado tendente a difamar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y provocar la guerra contra esta.
					
					  Si el imperialismo yanqui y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos lanzan una bala o un proyectil a la sagrada tierra y aguas jurisdiccionales, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC  no  perderan la oportunidad de oro y lo extenderan a la gran guerra para la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  La RPDC tiene las invencibles fuerzas militares y el disuasivo autodefensivo capaces de aniquilar implacablemente a cualesquier agresores, y el poderoso patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y la unidad monolitica mas fuertes que el arma nuclear.  
					
					Al informarse de la inspeccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a una zona mas candente del extremo meridional del frente suroeste, todos los militares y civiles de Corea estan decididos a aniquilar de un golpe a los enemigos.
					
					  En acato a la orden del gran genial comandante de Paektu, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de la RPDC con el espiritu de defender a riesgo de la vida al lider y la patria y la invencible conviccion, castigaran implacablemente a los agresores y provocadores.
					
					  El mundo vera como la potencia del monte Paektu que enaltece al gran genial comandante acogera el segundo dia 27 de julio tras aniquilar a los locos belicos.

articles.title: Caravana de antorcha de jovenes pasa provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
articles.content:
Caravana de antorcha de jovenes pasa provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- La caravana de carrera de relevos con antorcha de los jovenes (columna para la zona costera oriental), que habia partido del monte Paektu, paso hoy la ciudad de Hamhung.
					El dia 18, la antorcha fue entregada en la cima del monte Machon a los relevos de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur por los mismos de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					La caravana de los jovenes de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur atraveso la ciudad de Tanchon y el distrito de Pukchong donde recibio la bienvenida de trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Los corredores rindieron homenaje a los grandes hombres sin pares tras depositar cestos y ramos de flores ante el mural de mosaicos con las imagenes de los grandes hombres sin pares, levantado en la Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos de Tanchon, y ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erigida en el distrito de Pukchong.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la reunion de felicitacion preparada por los funcionarios de la Direccion General de la Mineria de la Zona de Tanchon y los mineros heroes, los entrevistados con los grandes hombres sin pares y los innovadores jovenes de las empresas y minas adscritas a esa Direccion.
					
					En la reunion al lado de fogata de los jovenes y estudiantes del distrito de Pukchong, los participantes expresaron la decision de acondicionar mejor su localidad.
					
					Durante la visita a la Granja Fruticola de Ryongjon y la Escuela Secundaria de Sojung del distrito de Rakwon, los integrantes de la caravana recordaron con emocion la abnegacion patriotica de los grandes hombres para el desarrollo de fruticultura y la educacion de las generaciones venideras.
					
					Arribados a Hamhung, ellos rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung luego de depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erigidas en el municipio de Hungnam y la colina Tonghung.
					
					Ademas, visitaron el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y otras fabricas, empresas y granjas recordando las imborrables huellas de guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien realizo la orientacion en el terreno sobre la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida.
					
					Tuvo lugar el acto de juramento de los jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					En esa ocasion, los oradores decidieron seguir con fidelidad la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y producir milagros e innovaciones en los sectores mas dificiles de la construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					La columna de antorcha paso los distritos de Kumya y Kowon.
